DODSResponseHandler * OPeNDAPLeavesCommand::parse_request (  DODSTokenizer &  tokenizer,
DODSDataHandlerInterface &  dhi
)  [virtual]
 

knows how to parse a show leaves request

This class knows how to parse a show leaves request, building a sub response handler that actually knows how to build the requested response object.

A show leaves request looks like:

show leaves [for <node>];

where node is a node in the tree returned from a previous show nodes request.

This parse method creates the sub response handler that knows how to create the specified information

Parameters:
tokenizer holds on to the list of tokens to be parsed
dhi structure that holds request and response information
Exceptions:
DODSParserException if there is a problem parsing the request

Implements OPeNDAPCommand.
